content: MT-C-T A Corner bracket Adjustable angle bracket for assembling strut channels in a T shape ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Adjustability – provides up to 25 mm of flexibility during fixation of horizontal strut elements across the top of vertical strut elements Adaptable – unlike welding, angle brackets allow you to modify strut channel framing during installation and for future MEP requirements Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Fastening horizontal MT strut channel to vertical MT girders, such as for integrated raised floors in data centers Assembling 2D metal framing for MEP support structures Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Pre-galvanized - for dry indoor use only Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2272056 - Connector MT-C-T A adj transv - Package Size 20 pc
